archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SWE.4.BP1 Develop software unit verification strategy including regression strategy
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Develop a strategy for verification of the software units including regression strategy for re-verification if a software unit is changed. The verification strategy shall define how to provide evidence for compliance of the software units with the software detailed design and with the non-functional requirements. NOTE 1: Possible techniques for unit verification include static/dynamic analysis, code reviews, unit testing etc
